co.cask.cdap.api.workflow

Class WorkflowNodeState

  • java.lang.Object
    • co.cask.cdap.api.workflow.WorkflowNodeState

  • @Beta
public class WorkflowNodeState
extends Object
    Class to represent the state of the node in the Workflow.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      WorkflowNodeState(String nodeId, NodeStatus nodeStatus, String runId, Throwable failureCause)
      Create a new instance.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Throwable getFailureCause()
      Return the detail message string for failure if node execution failed, otherwise null is returned.
      String getNodeId()
      Return the id of the node for which the state is maintained.
      NodeStatus getNodeStatus()
      Return the status of the node for which the state is maintained.
      String getRunId()
      Return the run id if node represents programs, such as MapReduce or Spark.

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Constructor Detail

      • WorkflowNodeState

        public WorkflowNodeState(String nodeId,
                 NodeStatus nodeStatus,
                 @Nullable
                 String runId,
                 @Nullable
                 Throwable failureCause)
        Create a new instance.
        Parameters:
        nodeId - id of the node inside the Workflow
        nodeStatus - status of the node
        runId - run id assigned to the node, null if current node represents custom action or predicate
        failureCause - cause of failure, null if execution of the node succeeded

    • Method Detail

      • getNodeId

        public String getNodeId()
        Return the id of the node for which the state is maintained.

      • getNodeStatus

        public NodeStatus getNodeStatus()
        Return the status of the node for which the state is maintained.

      • getRunId

        @Nullable
public String getRunId()
        Return the run id if node represents programs, such as MapReduce or Spark. For custom actions and predicates we do not currently have run id, so method returns null.

      • getFailureCause

        @Nullable
public Throwable getFailureCause()
        Return the detail message string for failure if node execution failed, otherwise null is returned.
